issue.title: Pricing: saving an "organism pricing" fails if there is not at least one "rebate for category"
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Saving an "organism pricing" fails if there is not at least one "rebate for category"
But this is optional, we should be able to save the "organism pricing" without any rebate.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Battaglia Marc

Duplicate the #1008 issue. Rejected
